mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT B.*, ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT F_SEQ ,F_NM ,(SELECT A.CD_NM FROM BASE_CD A WHERE A.CD_TP ='F_KIND' AND A.CD_V = F_KIND) AS F_KIND ,(SELECT A.CD_NM FROM BASE_CD A WHERE A.CD_TP ='F_UNIT' AND A.CD_V = F_UNIT) AS F_UNIT ,(SELECT A.CD_NM FROM BASE_CD A WHERE A.CD_TP ='F_YEAR' AND A.CD_V = F_YEAR) AS F_YEAR FROM FIX_TP ORDER BY F_SEQ DESC ) B WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end} ) WHERE RN >= #{start}
SELECT F_SEQ ,F_NM ,F_KIND ,F_UNIT ,F_YEAR FROM FIX_TP WHERE F_SEQ = #{f_SEQ}
